build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm ci && npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && php artisan storage:link && php artisan optimize

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --class=DatabaseSeeder && php-fpm -R && nginx -g 'daemon off;'
